edu.worcester.cs499summer2012.task

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.worcester.cs499summer2012.task.Task

  • public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single task. A task contains information such as a name, completion status, and due date. Tasks are parcelable so they can be bundled with intents and passed between activities.
    Author:
    Jonathan Hasenzahl, James Celona
